text: well there can be a few more vivid
depictions of how unfinished Ukraine's
revolution is than this hundreds of
these men mostly men bearing the black
and red flags of their far-right
grouping the right sector they say these
colors represent the blood of Ukrainians
built on the black soil their critics
say their neo-nazis these guys were
instrumental in overthrowing Ukraine's
pro-russian president a year and a half
ago and now they're back here on
Independence Square they're protesting
against the current government many of
them as you can see are in camouflage
fatigues
they've come straight from the battles
of the east of war that they say is a
war with Russia pure and simple
I've been spending some time with them
over the past few days it's not easy to
judge exactly how strong they are in
terms of numbers or exactly what the
extent of their far-right ideology is
but what is clear is that they're very
motivated and that the government relies
on them to help them fight this war in
the east and in recent days they've been
flexing their muscles there have been
shootouts with regular Ukrainian forces
in other parts of a country and some of
these men are now saying to me that they
want to bring down this government as
well and they'll do that
by force if necessary a weak government
here in Ukraine tired from fighting in
the East is now at risk of falling prey
to a group of armed men that it doesn't
control
